metadata.synopsis: One-liner for the Civilian5 from the Heapside Kitchen Helper Vignette.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the male human child behind the backdoor of the Elfsong tavern's kitchen.

0.speaker: Pickles
0.text: My tummy hurts. I'm really hungry...

1.speaker: Pickles
1.text: Some days we get to eat two times. Those are my favourite days.
1.context: NodeContext: A little excited then wistful on the second sentence
